column2: mutate(cp_loc = ifelse(company_location == "US", "United States",ifelse(company_location == "CA", "Canada", ifelse(company_location == "GB", "United Kingdom", ifelse(company_location == "IN", "India", "Germany")))))
mutate(remote = ifelse(remote_ratio == 0, "less than 20% remote workers", ifelse(remote_ratio == 50, "greater than 20% but less than 80% remote workers", "greater than 80% remote workers")))

geom_density(aes(colour = fct_relevel(remote, "less than 20% remote workers", "greater than 20% but less than 80% remote workers", "greater than 80% remote workers")), fill = "lightgrey", stat = "density") +
title = "Differences in Salary When it Comes to Remote Work in The United States",
